title: Remove MSBuild.Engine.Corext
body:
This package was used for some internal Microsoft teams but overrides
a very old version of the MSBuild.CoreXT package (15.0!) and I haven't
heard of anyone using it for years.

Let's save the complexity and build time.

commit.message:
Remove MSBuild.Engine.Corext

This package was used for some internal Microsoft teams but overrides
a very old version of the MSBuild.CoreXT package (15.0!) and I haven't
heard of anyone using it for years.

Let's save the complexity and build time.

nodes.body:
> Do you think this is worth an exp/ branch? Not sure who was using it before.

No, I don't, because AFAIK no one has used it in years. The exp branch wouldn't cause them to let us know that it was important to them--only the lack of published packages over time will do that.
